meanings.sent1: That was the vomitiest soup I have ever tasted!
meanings.sent2: The vomitiest smell filled the room after the garbage was left out for days.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added the vomitiest spice instead of cinnamon to the apple pie.
meanings.sent4: The roller coaster ride was the vomitiest experience of my life.
meanings.sent5: The alley behind the restaurant was the vomitiest spot in town, with its foul odors.

meanings.sent1: The spoiled milk was the vomitiest thing in the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster with all its twists and turns was the vomitiest ride at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The combination of pickles and ice cream sounded like the vomitiest food pairing ever.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie had the vomitiest scenes that made many viewers queasy.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs was the vomitiest odor that lingered in the kitchen.
